title: Referrals XXX | Save Online On Your Next Shopping

openGraph.ogTitle: Referrals XXX | Save Online On Your Next Shopping

content.h1: Refer Your Friends and Earn 10% Commission
content.p1: Use your unique link to invite your friends and earn up to 10% commission every time they makes a purchase through XXX.
content.h2b: Share my referral link with friends
content.p7: Use your unique link to invite your friends and earn up to 20% commission every time they makes a purchase through XXX.
content.p2: Limits apply on max amount of referral bonuses you can receive.
content.p3: Share your unique referral link with friends and family.
content.p4: Your friends and family sign up and use XXX when they shop online.
content.p5: Your referee receives their rewards for shopping, of which you earn 10%.
content.p6: Join XXX and use your unique link to invite your friends to earn up 10% commission
content.p9: Pending e (3-14 days), your transaction will appear here.
content.notfound: No referrals found for selected month.
